mapper.sql: hq_id AS hqId, pm_id AS pmId, hq_type AS hqType, hq_content AS hqContent, hq_question_count AS hqQuestionCount, hq_publish_time AS hqPublishTime, hq_spider_time AS hqSpiderTime, hq_page_view AS hqPageView, hq_question_user AS hqQuestionUser, hq_question_user_photo AS hqQuestionUserPhoto, hq_url AS hqUrl, hq_tag AS hqTag
mapper.select:
SELECT hq.hq_content,rc.comments_content,hq.hq_type,hq.hq_tag,hq.hq_publish_time,hqs.hs_status FROM house_question hq LEFT JOIN house_question_status hqs on hq.hq_id = hqs.hq_id LEFT JOIN reply_comments rc on hq.hq_url =rc.hq_url WHERE 1=1
AND hq.hq_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hqType},'%')
AND hq.hq_tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hqTag},'%')
AND hq.hq_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hqContent},'%')
GROUP BY hq.hq_id
